channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Old furniture and wood in the street, 21st June
item.description:
There is pile of old furniture and other stuff in the street at the back of the gym, it has been there for several weeks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Station Approach, New Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned vehicle at DA8 2LR, sitting for 2 months., 21st June
item.description:
The car appears to have been left unattended for an extended period and is likely abandoned. Could you please arrange for it to be removed? Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hilden Drive, Slade Green, London

item.title: Full bins, 21st June
item.description:
These 2 bins are outside the back of the co op in Steynton ave, not sure which flat or shop they belong to. They are both full of mixed rubbish and have been there for nearly a year. They are obviously not used, can they be removed please. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 26-28, Steynton Avenue, Albany Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Yet more flytipping here, 21st June
item.description:
More fly tipping at the top of Fingal street where it meets Woolwich Road. It starts small and people keep adding to it. PLEASE council, remove it fast and put in stronger deterrents!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fingal Street, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: On the south end of Honiton Road, 21st June
item.description:
The lower branches of a large tree have come loose and are now blocking the pavement.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Honiton Road, London

item.title: An ash tree is growing out of the pavement., 21st June
item.description:
This has been reported before (7665243) but the problem has not been addressed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pilgrim's Lane, Belsize Park, London

item.title: Minster Road Fordwych Road junction, 21st June
item.description:
The junction of Minster Road and Fordwych Road is a terrible junction. For some reason Minster Road drivers think they have priority over Fordwych. I drive up this road twice a day most days and most days i witness a near accident or in the case of today an actual accident where a white van driver from Minster Road knocked down a woman on Fordwych Road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 24, Minster Road, Kilburn, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large bee nest near Tong Farm pathway, 21st June
item.description:
There is a large bees nest by the little pool by the bridge. The nest is large and in the ground, between pool and pathway. Suggest this be removed for health and safety reasons as passers by or dogs could easily be stung - bees very active!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Botany Bay Lane, Chislehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous overhanging spikey vegatation, 21st June
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rushmore Close, Bickley, London

item.title: Large branch fallen, 21st June
item.description:
